long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest digital signage platform on the planet. Sets up in 3 quick steps! 

In the era of smart phones and cloud computing, you shouldn't need to hire an IT team to set up a digital sign. XOGO makes the process incredibly easy. Just download this app and use our free manager app https://manager.xogo.io to turn any screen into a digital sign. Create and schedule a playlist of images, videos, and websites. A perfect solution for retail, hospitality, schools, assisted living, corporate environments, or any situation where you want to schedule content to run on a screen!

This is the Chrome player. However, XOGO Player runs on any Windows, Android, Fire TV, WebOS, BrightSign or Chrome device. Connecting this player to your account is simple. Use https://manager.xogo.io and enter the PIN code the comes up on your screen. Please check out https://www.xogo.io/getting-started for step-by-step instructions and an intro video.
